medium: Molded thermalplastic structural tubes and connectors, bronze tinted and acrylic central octahedron, acrylic and epoxy paint
title: Duo-tet Star Polyhedra
description: square open cube on openwork base; yellow, purple, red, cream-colored, orange and chrome plastic tubes connected together with metal balls with multiple threaded openings, in the manner of Tinkertoys; smoked Plexi cube in center; received with base disassembled
creditline: Gift of the Charles W. and Sally P. Oswald Memorial Collection
